name: Swiiitch
description:
Swiitch is a minimal 3D platformer First Person.

Q W E is your only controls. You can pick up mechanics to bind them on Q, W or E to help you to resolve the level.
This game has been made by two students in Game Design :
- Dorian Ribeiro
- Léonard Savio

Don't hesitate to give us your feedbacks and your thoughts !

Good Luck and Have Fun !!
